location.sjis: グマグの炎遺跡 エリア５

portrait_l.name: tram
portrait_l.sjis: 私に勝つまで そこは通しませんよ
portrait_l.ascii: I won't let you through unless you can beat me.

portrait_l.name: tram
portrait_l.sjis: どんな武器を使って 私に挑んでくるつもりか知りませんが まあ、がんばってくださいね
portrait_l.ascii: I don't know what kind of weapon you intend to challenge me with, but well, good luck to you.
